string.text: This tacticool weapon kit will upgrade a base weapon (LEWD) with performance parts and scopes, enhancing it's battle readiness for special operations.
This specialized weapon kit will upgrade a base weapon (LEWD) with selected parts and scopes, to perform with excellence in a specialist role, such as an infiltrator.
This precision weapon kit will upgrade a base weapon (LEWD) with fine-tuned parts and scopes, to significantly raise its long-range engagement and sniper capabilites.
This brutal weapon kit will upgrade a base weapon (LEWD) with hardened parts and scopes, to enhance sustained high-RPM fire and maximize the kill-ratio in close quarter.
